sen.e: In the Shochu Disturbance and so on, he remonstrated the Emperor Godaigo, who held secret conferences to overthrow Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) and, on the occasion of Genko Incident (abortive coup of Genko era) in 1329, he informed Rokuhara Tandai (an administrative and judicial agency in Rokuhara, Kyoto) about the second secret conference for overthrowing the bakufu.
